greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficient of x^(2*n) in the expansion of (1 + x^3 + x^4)^n.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=ceiling(n/2)..floor(2*n/3)} binomial(n,k)*binomial(k,2*n-3*k). - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 01 2011
program: (MAGMA) P<x>:=PolynomialRing(Integers()); [ Coefficients((1+x^3+x^4)^n)[ 2*n+1 ]: n in [0..30] ]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Jul 01 2011
results.author: _Joerg Arndt_, Jul 01 2011
